resources.string: The game is about defending the NJIT campus against a monster invasion. You have to physically walk around in campus to search for the monsters in the game. Then, you have to destroy the monsters hiding throughout the NJIT campus to gain points.
1. Click the "Play" button to start searching for monsters.
2. Walk to the location of nearby fire power to increase your power. The fire power is used to hit the monster when you find it. You can find monsters only near NJIT campus.
3. When you find a monster on the map, start tilting the phone to move the blue round target onto the monster and touch the screen anywhere to throw fire at the monster.
4. When fire hits the monster, it gets hurt and escapes to a new location. The monster can escape for two times, but the third hit will completely destroy it.
5. To track the escaped monster, click on the "Hints" button which will provide the blood trail of the monster.
6. Check the achievements screen to find out how to unlock the achievement.

7. Check the leaderboards screen to find who is leading at each level. In the beginning, you are in level 1. As you complete each level described in achievements, your score will be posted to next level.

1. Enable monster alerts in the settings screen to perform monster search in the background. This helps in getting alerts when the monster is found while the screen is OFF, which saves the phone battery.
2. Click on the sentinel to place it at your current location. The sentinel alerts you, independent of your location, when it detects the monster in its range.
3. You receive more score points when the monster is destroyed. To destroy it, simply track it and hit it three times. Enable GPS and WiFi in phone settings to find monsters more quickly.

4. To increase the chance of hitting the monster, try to throw fire when the monster is between the player avatar and the blue target. To improve the game skill, you can practice using practice hunt feature from game map screen settings.
5. Each time you hit the monster, you will receive a certain amount of bonus fire power.
6. Unlock the genie achievement listed after level 2 to get more detailed info on where the monster escaped.
